weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the night unfolds under a blanket of crisp clarity, a canvas painted with the gentle whispers of a light north wind. As midnight approaches, the temperature dips into the cool embrace of around 43 degrees, inviting a cozy retreat into layered attire. The city glimmers, its nocturnal charm amplified as light dances on the surfaces of quiet streets. The typical fog that caresses the bay has taken a respite tonight, allowing the skyline to stand prominently against the darkened sky, punctuated by the twinkling of distant lights.

Tomorrow promises more of this splendid clarity. A sunny day awaits, with the sun climbing steadily to near 55 degrees before tapering off to about 52 in the afternoon. The same gentle breeze will persist, offering comfort as locals and visitors venture outdoors. It’s an excellent day for a leisurely stroll through the iconic streets, perhaps finding a corner café for an artisanal coffee or an inviting lunch spot bathed in sunlight. Remember to don a light jacket as the coolness of the early morning lingers and the evening chill returns. As the day unfolds, harness this lovely weather to engage in the mundane yet wonderfully enriching—exploring hidden alleys or simply soaking in the beauty of a quintessential San Francisco winter day.
